short_summary: INVITATION TO SUBMIT AN EXPRESSION OF INTEREST (EOI)
full_summary:
--------------------------------
### Invitation to Submit an Expression of Interest (EOI)

**Reference Number:** PW-23-01016640

**Public Services and Procurement Canada (PSPC) invites [insert description] to submit an expression of interest for a potential lease of approximately 533 usable square meters of office space**.

**Key Requirements:**

*   Lease term of approximately 12 years, commencing on or about September 1, 2025
*   Approximately 533 usable square meters of contiguous office space
*   Location in the city of Calgary, within the following geographical boundaries:
    *   North: From the intersection of Crowchild Trail NW & Stoney Trail NW - North/Northeast on Stoney Trail NW (South Side only) to Deerfoot Trail
    *   South: From the intersection of Center Street N & 16 Avenue NW/Hwy1 - West on 16 Avenue NW/Hwy 1 (North side only) to Crowchild Trail NW
    *   East: From the intersection of Stoney Trail NW & Deerfoot Trail - South on Deerfoot Trail (West side only), West on 64 Avenue NE (North side only), South on Centre Street N (West side only) to 16 Avenue NW/Hwy 1
    *   West: From the intersection of Crowchild Trail NW & 16 Avenue NW/Hwy 1 - North on Crowchild Trail NW (East side only), West on 32 Avenue NW (North side only), North on 49 Street NW (East side only), East on 40 Avenue NW (South side only), North on Shaganappi Trail NW (East side only), Northwest on Crowchild Trail NW (Northeast side only) to Stoney Trail NW

**Preferred Features:**

*   Highly visible storefront space
*   Direct pedestrian access from the street
*   Fully accessible to persons with a disability
*   Parking for approximately 10 vehicles available within a one (1) block radius of the proposed space

**Contact Information:**

*   Name: Leon Lam
*   Email: [leon.lam@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca](mailto:leon.lam@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca)
*   Phone: 587-338-3619
*   Address: Canada Place, 10th floor, Suite 1000, 9700 Jasper Avenue, Edmonton, AB T5J 4C3
